entity.name: code_entity
entity.query: select entity_id, fqn, entity_type from entities as e inner join projects as proj on proj.project_id=e.project_id where e.length > 0 and e.entity_type in ('CLASS','METHOD','CONSTRUCTOR') and proj.has_source=1 and proj.project_type='CRAWLED' and (e.entity_id >= '${dataimporter.request.lo_eid_incl}' and e.entity_id < '${dataimporter.request.hi_eid_excl}')
entity.deltaQuery: select entity_id from entities where last_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: second_pass
entity.query: SELECT entity_id as eid, entity_type as etype from entities where entity_id='${code_entity.entity_id}'

entity.name: simMLT
entity.query: select fqn as simMLT_fqn_via_jdkLib_use from entities where entity_id in (${second_pass.simMLT_eids_via_jdkLib_use})

entity.name: simTC
entity.query: select fqn as simTC_fqn_via_jdkLib_use from entities where entity_id in (${second_pass.simTC_eids_via_jdkLib_use})

entity.name: simHD
entity.query: select fqn as simHD_fqn_via_jdkLib_use from entities where entity_id in (${second_pass.simHD_eids_via_jdkLib_use})

entity.name: jdkLib_use
entity.query: select provE.fqn as pfqn_jdkLib, provE.entity_id as peid_jdkLib from relations as R inner join entities as provE on provE.entity_id=R.rhs_eid where R.internal = 0 and R.relation_type in ('CALLS','EXTENDS','IMPLEMENTS','INSTANTIATES','USES') and R.lhs_eid='${code_entity.entity_id}'

entity.name: jdkLib_use_comment
entity.query: select C.comment_id as commentId from entities as E inner join projects as P on P.project_id=E.project_id inner join comments as C on C.following_eid=E.entity_id where P.has_source=1 and E.entity_type <> 'DUPLICATE' and E.entity_type <> 'UNKNOWN' and E.length IS NOT NULL and C.length > 0 and C.comment_type='JAVADOC' and E.fqn='${jdkLib_use.pfqn_jdkLib}' order by P.project_id asc limit 1
